name: Idle Arrows - Merge Game
description:
Your castle is overrun by terrible monsters. As the protector of your castle, you are called upon duty to reinforce your defenses by deploying weapons and upgrading them.



Features:

Advance through thousands of levels of fun
Defeat unique monsters
Merge your weapons to upgrade them and deploy them on your castle to attack enemies
Tap to attack with your character
Prestige for veteran players and get up to 80% more power!
